title: MD
biography: Antônio Drauzio Varella is a Brazilian physician, scientist, writer, and medical science communicator. Varella has often commented publicly on issues such as prison conditions, social welfare, government, literature, medicine, and skepticism, and has frequently debunked pseudoscientific medical claims.
aiSummary: Drauzio Varella is a oncology specialist with an H-index of 14 at University of São Paulo (Member). Has been published in Brazilian Journal of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Research in Veterinary Science. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
